title: Once more, Boom Boom Vi

replies.body: Well you could say she is, A KNOCKOUT. Im sorry, thank you for not laughing.

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=MEBvtjHj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-05T05:01:23.649+0000)
>
> Looks like fanservice to me.

Except female boxers wear their outfit like the one shown in the OP (not all of them wear that, but a lot do) because they work, and not because it looks pretty to some people.

Also, skins are fan service anyway, it's not news.
If you think a woman in appropriate sports attire knocking you out is that, we're not going to judge you. We all have our quirks.

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=MEBvtjHj,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-06T04:29:13.088+0000)
>
> If you think a woman in appropriate sports attire knocking you out is that, we're not going to judge you. We all have our quirks.

She is a fucking fantasy character. Who are you to say what attire is right for a woman to wear you weeb.

[http://www.wban.org/biog/briley.htm](http://www.wban.org/biog/briley.htm)

Because it's based on real life sports, that's why. Women can wear what they want, and what's portrayed in the art piece in the OP is realistic sports attire for competitive boxing.

Men go shirtless, so it's not exactly a woman thing. 

So please, chill the fuck out. Or at least do your own research before calling me a "weeb."

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=MEBvtjHj,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-06T04:38:31.641+0000)
>
> [http://www.wban.org/biog/briley.htm](http://www.wban.org/biog/briley.htm)
> 
> Because it's based on real life sports, that's why. Women can wear what they want, and what's portrayed in the art piece in the OP is realistic sports attire for competitive boxing.
> 
> Men go shirtless, so it's not exactly a woman thing. 
> 
> So please, chill the fuck out. Or at least do your own research before calling me a "weeb."

Im not clicking on that link because i don't go around clicking on random links from people i don't know. I didn't think you could get any more dumb. Not exactly a woman thing? Maybe you should do your research. Ever hear of ronda rousey? Search her up and look what she wears and tell me that isn't realistic. People like you live a sad life because you feel the need to ruin everything for everyone with your views on how woman should look, act, or be portrayed in a fantasy fucking game. Please go hide in your world where woman are covered head to toe in burqas.

>Please go hide in your world where woman are covered head to toe in burqas.

Okay, I don't think we're on the same page.

I'm just hoping we eventually get a Boxing Vi skin like on the original post.
Don't worry, it was just a joke.
Something something Vi's base skin is already know for being a "boxer", so not in the foreseeable future. Something something Dark side, something something complete.

something something Lee Sin martial arts monk here have some martial arts and monk skins. Something something foxfire Ahri something something fish Nami something Sona musician skins something something.

Obviously you can tell I don't buy it. Vi boxing skin, please.
Once more, the gloves aren't big enough. get those baby sized gloves out of here.
Its amazing! But sadly its too plain, add more decals!!
I'd throw my money at Riot for it. :(
It's so obvious. Riot. What is taking so long?
For real, how is this not a skin yet?
cool skin but I can't play vi
